present.perfect: I have worked here for five years.
present.perfect_continuous: I have been working since morning.

past.continuous: I was working when you called.
past.perfect: I had worked before you arrived.
past.perfect_continuous: I had been working for hours.

future.continuous: I will be working at 3 PM.
future.perfect: I will have worked by then.
future.perfect_continuous: I will have been working for 10 hours.
